[[>]]
[[module Rate]]

[[div class="meta-title"]]
Ralliston's Authorpage
[[/div]]

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/from-120-s-archives-hub/banner-2.png width="100%"]]

@@ @@

Oh, hi there! I'm [[*user Ralliston]]. Welcome to my authorpage!

Having joined the site on the last day of 2019, I've been trapped in the perpetual hell that is writing for the SCP Wiki for a while now. I mainly enjoy writing modern fantasy stories and articles set in my canon, [[[from-120-s-archives-hub|From 120's Archives]]], but I also enjoy other canons, too! So much so, in fact, that I am the only person (as of writing) to have ever written for all 49 of them. I'm a sucker for a good book, a cup of tea, and listening to the rain pour down my windows. I come from Poland, so (unsurprisingly) I'm also a member of the PL wiki branch, where I sometimes write a thing or two, and have [*http://scp-pl.wikidot.com/zaginiona-osoba-r-alliston another authorpage]. I also have a [*https://bsky.app/profile/rallistonscp.bsky.social Bluesky account], where I infrequently post and plug.

@@ @@

This includes dealing with all sorts of problems that would arise, such as licensing issues, etc. If they for whatever reason, cannot do that, my works belong to the community at large.

The only exceptions are of course collaborations, which go to their respective co-authors.
